name: Firebase Genkit
description: Build production-ready AI applications with Firebase Genkit. Includes project initialization, flow templates, deployment tools, and an AI assistant specialized in Genkit development.

features.title: Quick Project Setup
features.description: Initialize new Genkit projects with TypeScript, JavaScript, Go, or Python in seconds

features.title: Flow Templates
features.description: 6 production-ready templates including Chat, RAG, Tool Calling, Multi-step, and Streaming

features.title: Multi-Platform Deployment
features.description: Deploy to Firebase, Cloud Run, Vercel, Docker, and more with guided wizards

features.title: AI Assistant
features.description: Specialized Genkit expert for architecture design, debugging, and optimization

features.title: Health Monitoring
features.description: Comprehensive health checks for dependencies, configuration, and project setup

commands.title: Initialize Genkit Project
commands.description: Create a new Firebase Genkit project with interactive setup

commands.title: Start Development Server
commands.description: Launch Genkit dev server with Developer UI

commands.title: Create Flow
commands.description: Generate new flows from production-ready templates

commands.title: Deploy Application
commands.description: Deploy to Firebase, Cloud Run, Vercel, or Docker

agents.name: genkit-assistant
agents.title: Genkit Expert
agents.description: AI assistant specialized in Firebase Genkit development, architecture, and best practices
